snippet: The authorities said that a man being pursued by the police shot one officer in the leg and was in turn shot and wounded in Bedford-Stuyvesant early Sunday.
abstract: Naim Owens of Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn, is charged with attempted murder and assault on a police officer after shooting Police Officer John Hirschberger in the leg during a chase; Hirschberger was treated at Kings County Hospital Center and released.
lead_paragraph: The authorities said that a man being pursued by the police shot one officer in the leg and was in turn shot and wounded in Bedford-Stuyvesant early Sunday.

headline.main: Officer and Gunman Are Wounded in Brooklyn, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Officer and Gunman Wounded in Brooklyn, Police Say
